title: How do you gift skins on the new store client?
body: It looks different and doesn't give you the option to gift people anymore.

replies.body:
Hey HxPunisher,

The store's UI did change a bit with the recent update to it. Our [Gifting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) has been updated to walk you through the new interface.

Let me know if this helped you out.
